remarks: Value of join for a poset with LUB expanded.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 11-Sep-2018.)
statement:
joinval2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
joinval2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
joinval2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
joinval2.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
joinval2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
joinval2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
joinval2 $p |- ( ph -> ( X .\/ Y ) = ( iota_ x e. B ( ( X .<_ x /\ Y .<_ x ) /\ A. z e. B ( ( X .<_ z /\ Y .<_ z ) -> x .<_ z ) ) ) ) $.
$d .\/ x z $.
$d B x z $.
$d K x z $.
$d X x z $.
$d Y x z $.
